name: Out of CTRL - WebGL in Description
name_original: Out of CTRL - WebGL in Description
description:
You boot up your Windows XP PC to play games before school and you encounter a message recommending a game. Little do you know you're about to have to help characters survive an onslaught of popups, navigating them through the world with the help of your handy CONTROL PANEL.

WebGL: https://adamsimsgamedev.github.io/
